multimonster.mediaproxy
Interface MediaProxyFacade

All Known Implementing Classes:
MediaProxyImplBean
public interface MediaProxyFacade

The interface for the MediaProxy-component. Represents the user-interface for media in- and output. Manages the different proxies, distributes the requestes to running instances.

Author:
Jörg Meier

Method Summary
 void directInput(byte[] file, java.lang.String link)
          For direct insert of a media file without any ProxyPlugin.

          Returns an address where media data has to be transferred.

          Returns an address where media data of a certain protocol and format can be fetched.

directInput

public void directInput(byte[] file,
                        java.lang.String link)
For direct insert of a media file without any ProxyPlugin. For test and demo.

Parameters:
file - the media file
link - the link that would normally be used to insert via a proxy-plugin
